name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 1, Xinyang, Henan. A citizen was riding a bicycle while setting off fireworks, and was subsequently pinned to the ground by the police, who kicked him several times.
Onlookers shouted "Police violent law enforcement"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CITIC Securities: The A-share bull market in 2025 is expected to gradually move from a "liquidity bull" to a "fundamentals bull"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 1, a netizen named "Mi Mi Ge" who was concerned about Li Yixue's current situation, dressed in a mental patient's uniform, supported Li Yixue at the Bayi Square in Nanchang, and was subsequently taken away by the police. The netizen said to the police: Is there anything wrong with me wearing this dress?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 1, a man in Haozhou City, Anhui Province, was forcibly carried away by the police after setting off fireworks. During the process, the fireworks splashed on the onlookers. In the end, the police held him up and finished setting off the fireworks.
According to the answer of Baidu AI, the public security organs shall order the cessation of the illegal setting off of fireworks and impose a fine of less than 500 yuan. The Public Security Administration Punishment Law does not give the police the right to take compulsory measures for setting off fireworks. Forcibly carrying away people who set off fireworks is suspected of excessive law enforcement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the beginning of the new year, two suspected terrorist attacks occurred in the United States in succession. At 8 am on January 1, Pacific Time, a Tesla Cybertruck exploded violently in front of the Trump Hotel in Las Vegas, killing one person and injuring at least seven people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At the beginning of the new year, two suspected terrorist attacks occurred in the United States
In the early morning of January 1, US time, a pickup truck deliberately rammed into a crowd in New Orleans, Louisiana, causing 15 deaths and multiple injuries
The suspect is 42-year-old Shamsood Din Jabbar, an American citizen from Texas, who died after exchanging fire with the police...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A woman spent 36,000 yuan in a beauty hospital and had her face swollen and deformed after 9 injections. She was handcuffed and detained for 12 hours by the police for normal rights protection, and was stripped naked twice for personal examination.
23 years, Chengdu, Sichuan, Ms. Peng went to Jiaodian Medical Beauty Institution for facial micro-plastic surgery, which cost a total of 36,000 yuan, including 4 white angels, 2 hyaluronic acid, 2 panda needles, and 1 botulinum toxin. After the operation, Ms. Peng's face was swollen and bruised, and there was no improvement after a month.
She went to the beauty salon three times for this. The first time was on August 18, the second time was around the end of August, and the third time was an appointment with the Health Commission. All three times were unsuccessful. "The beauty salon's plan is to refund me 25,000 yuan, and my request is to refund 30,000 yuan, so we didn't reach an agreement."
After failing to communicate with the beauty salon for a refund, Ms. Peng went to the beauty salon again on September 6, 2023 to meet the person in charge. The beauty salon called the police, saying that she was disrupting the business order.
After the police arrived,...
fullContent:
女子在美容医院花费3.6万注射9针之后脸肿变形，正常维权被警察铐上手铐拘留12小时，并两次脱光衣服人身检查
23年 四川成都 彭女士前往娇点医学美容机构进行面部微整形，共花费3.6万元，其中包括4支濡白天使、2支玻尿酸、2支熊猫针、1支肉毒素。术后彭女士的脸肿得厉害出现淤青，一个月后仍未见好转
她为此去过三次美容院，第一次去是8月18日，第二次大约是8月底，第三次是和卫健委预约去的，这三次都无功而返。“美容院的方案就是给我退2.5万元，我的诉求是退3万元，所以没谈拢。”
彭女士在与美容院沟通退款未果后，于2023年9月6日再次前往美容院要求见负责人。美容院报警，称她扰乱经营秩序。
警察到场后，彭女士被按倒在地，从背后铐上手铐押上警车，强行带离现场，彭女士一起前往的朋友也拍下了这一幕。
“我当时被押进了办案区内一个很小的地方，进去就被要求脱得一丝不挂，一个女的要检查我的衣物和身体，然后做了尿检检查是否吸毒，还量了身高等一系列检查，然后录口供……”那天，彭女士说她在派出所被关了12个小时。
办理此案的民警答复记者时表示，根据规定，办案区的人身检查是必要的，但否认了彭女士所说的脱光情况。
彭女士要求查看视频音频资料和与女警对质，但警方称资料已超过保存期限无法提供，对质也无意义。彭女士指出，检查笔录中有“全身上下无明显外伤”的记录，质疑如果不是脱光，如何能做出这样的检查结论。警方对此未给出明确答复。
“如果没让我脱光，他们从哪看我全身上下有没有外伤？隔着衣服能看到吗？说视频音频资料超过保存期限，这又不是监控视频，全程拍照是他们的办案证据，怎么会不保存？”彭女士气愤之余，又专门翻出她调阅的案卷给记者看，在人身检查笔录一页中，确如其所说，有上述字样。
2024年3月12日，彭女士等来了好消息：行政复议机关认为，芳草街派出所提交的证据无法证明彭女士行为导致四川娇点医学美容医院正常的工作、营业、医疗等活动不能正常进行，属于主要事实不清，证据不足。故决定撤销芳草街派出所对彭女士作出的《行政处罚决定书》。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Sichuan Jiaodian Medical Cosmetology Hospital involved in the incident once caused one person to die after surgery and was subject to multiple administrative penalties.
On April 18, 20, 27-year-old Xiao Wei died after failing to wake up after four days of treatment in the intensive care unit of West China Hospital of Sichuan University. Previously, she underwent four cosmetic surgeries at Chengdu Jiaodian Medical Cosmetology Hospital, including bilateral zygomatic bone and zygomatic arch reduction, bilateral mandibular angle long curve osteotomy, bilateral outer plate partial resection, and bilateral masseter muscle partial resection.
After the operation, Xiao Wei failed to wake up and was urgently transferred to West China Hospital and diagnosed with brain damage. The death certificate of West China Hospital shows that Xiao Wei was admitted to the hospital due to bilateral pupil dilation and died of brain damage after treatment, including subdural hematoma, large area of cerebral infarction, brain hernia, etc.
Sichuan Jiaodian Medical Cosmetology said that the operation went smoothly and denied that there was evidence that the death was directly related to the operation. The hospital provided an informed consent for anesthesia signed by Xiao Wei. The surgical records show that Xiao Wei was diagnosed with multiple facial problems before the operation...
fullContent:
涉事四川娇点医学美容曾致一人手术后死亡，并受到多项行政处罚
20年4月18日 27岁的小薇在四川大学华西医院重症监护室治疗4天后未能苏醒，不幸去世。此前，她在成都娇点医学美容医院接受了包括双侧颧骨颧弓降低术、双侧下颌角长曲线截骨术、双侧外板部分截除术和双侧咬肌部分切除术在内的4项整容手术
术后小薇未能苏醒，被紧急转至华西医院，诊断为脑部受损。华西医院的死亡证明显示，小薇因双侧瞳孔散大入院，经治疗后因脑部损伤去世，具体包括硬膜下血肿、大面积脑梗、脑疝等。
四川娇点医学美容表示手术顺利，否认有证据显示死亡与手术直接相关。医院提供了小薇签名的麻醉知情同意书。手术记录显示，小薇术前被诊断出多处面部问题。手术后，小薇未苏醒，医院采取了降温和药物治疗措施，并在咨询华西医院的专家后，怀疑颅内病变出血后建议转院。
小薇的死因及其与整容手术的关联成为家人的疑问。芳草街街道办介入调查，确认医院证照齐全，并建议若家属与院方调解不成，可启动司法程序。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The above administrative penalties, news and public opinion, and related court judgment records have all disappeared from the Tianyancha APP and have been completely wiped out.
In addition, the Judgment Documents Network shows that Jiaodian Medical Cosmetology Hospital is also involved in three medical damage liability disputes, with a total fine of hundreds of thousands of yuan. Long, Jia Shuai and Ye received surgery at Sichuan Jiaodian Medical Cosmetology Hospital and all suffered medical damage.
In 2015, Long suffered from facial defects and neurological problems due to mandibular angle surgery, and the court ordered the hospital to compensate 105,800 yuan. In 2017, Jia Shuai suffered from severe sequelae due to mandibular angle and zygomatic bone surgery, and the hospital was ordered to compensate 197,600 yuan. In 2018, Ye used improper materials for zygomatic bone repair surgery, and the court ordered the hospital to refund 45,000 yuan in surgery fees and compensate Ye 135,000 yuan, plus treatment fees and compensation totaling 126,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On New Year’s Eve on January 1, police blocked the flow of people at the South Gate of Zhengding County, Hebei Province, and prevented them from entering. However, tens of thousands of people collectively broke through the police blockade and entered the South Gate to participate in the New Year’s Eve activities. The police were unable to stop them and could only let them in.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: The incident occurred in Bozhou, Anhui, not Haozhou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a high school in Songyang, Henan Province, held a mass uprising because the school did not have a holiday on New Year's Day. The leaders then immediately agreed to give the school a holiday.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens added:
Zhengding police stopped people from entering the ancient city for the privilege of celebrating the New Year within the system.
This New Year's Day, CCTV held a New Year's Eve countdown event in Beijing, Tianjin and Hebei for the first time. The main venue for Hebei's New Year's Eve was at the South Gate of Zhengding. However, the South Gate New Year's Eve venue did not allow ordinary people to enter. Police and security guards intercepted ordinary people outside. In the end, tens of thousands of people broke through the police cordon and rushed into the venue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A student of the school posted a video saying: The Shandong Aluminum Vocational College Student Union bullied freshmen, broke into the dormitory in the name of the student union, and forcibly searched the students' personal belongings. In addition, the bureaucratic atmosphere was pervasive, and the confiscated contraband was not handed in and its whereabouts were unknown, which was suspected of embezzlement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The RMB exchange rate against the US dollar fell below 7.3 again

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 30th: A restaurant in Guangzhou, Guangdong was exposed for taking water from a public toilet and pouring it into the water dispenser bucket, using it as purified water to prepare meals and entertain customers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 31, in Ningde, Fujian, the staff on duty at the emergency pharmacy of the hospital fell asleep and "didn't wake up until 40 minutes after being called". The hospital: Criticism and education have been carried out.
It is reported that the night shift staff worked from 5:30 pm to 8 am the next day, a total of 14 and a half hours, and took a nap when they could not hold on any longer.
Netizens are criticizing the hospital's shift arrangement: "They would rather let patients wait than have more people on duty" "Classic criticism of those who work, not the one who invented this shift"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sichuan Dazhou Mingrenyuan Middle School teacher kissed female students in the office many times. Follow-up: The teacher involved is married and has children. The Education Bureau: The teacher involved has been suspended.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a man in Hohhot, Inner Mongolia, refused to pay the 8 yuan fare after being dissuaded from smoking by a taxi driver, and said that he worked in the Justice Bureau.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A careful netizen found that there was controversy in this incident. The receipt showed that he got on the bus at 0:20 and the charge ended at 21. It may be that the man got off the bus directly because the driver did not allow him to smoke.
However, no matter what the situation is, smoking in the presence of others is wrong unless others agree.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 2, Luoyang, Henan Province, a netizen said that the New Year's Day performance of Yichuan County Technical School had not started yet, but the first, second and third prizes had been decided in advance. He reported it in the group chat, but was kicked out by the teacher.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: New Year's Eve Jianghan Road, Wuhan, Hubei Province In order to save costs, unscrupulous merchants sold hydrogen balloons. During the release of balloons, some balloons were hung on power lines and exploded, resulting in at least three hydrogen explosions at the Wuhan New Year's Eve event, with flames shooting into the sky. Fortunately, no casualties were caused, and no power lines were broken to cause electric shock.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On New Year's Eve in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, a man used a Gatling gun to shoot at balloons released during the New Year's Eve event. Fortunately, the balloons that were hit were filled with helium and did not cause a hydrogen explosion. 
The man was then taken away by the police

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Ouyang Yun, a depositor of Henan Village Bank who had been detained for a year, dismissed his lawyer's defense. Qinyang Court did not answer the phone and made small moves to prevent people from attending the trial. The trial was held in secret and the verdict was announced in secret. Family members said: Ouyang Yun must have been forced to dismiss his lawyer's defense agency due to coercion, intimidation and inducement by the Henan authorities. A large number of depositors called the Qinyang Court of Henan to attend the trial, but the court's criminal court/court office/inspection phone number could not be reached. Many depositors believed that in order to avoid being held accountable for the wrongful case and apply for state compensation, Henan Public Security, Procuratorate and Court had to resort to this desperate measure. Ouyang Yun has been detained in Zhengzhou No. 3 Detention Center for almost a year. He has lost nearly 40 kilograms and is on the verge of mental collapse.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: The hydrogen balloon explosion occurred on January 1, 2024

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 2 (Released) Beijing. A company HR said that the superior gave optimization indicators, and there was a 36-year-old programmer on the optimization list. When they learned that the programmer had just divorced, his wife had cheated on him, and even the child might not be his, the HR thought that he had no weaknesses and was afraid that he would be unable to get over it, so they crossed him off the list and replaced him with a 31-year-old female employee who had just married and was about to have a child.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 1, Shandong, citizens gathered in the square to celebrate the New Year. As a result, after the countdown on the shopping mall screen ended, an advertisement for a dental hospital appeared the next second.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2, Hu Xijin published an article suggesting that ordinary people should avoid four traps: the first is the trap of pessimism; the second is to avoid the trap of anxiety; the third is to try to avoid the trap of involution; the fourth is to prevent falling into the trap of worrying about gains and losses.
Netizens accused Hu Xijin of eating meat: "Avoiding talking about the root causes of anxiety and pessimism? Without solving the root causes, I will first tell you not to be pessimistic and anxious."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 1, Zoucheng, Shandong. The Internet revealed that Guoyun Bus Company owed employees wages, and the drivers went on strike to stop operating to demand wages.
A driver said that the company had not paid wages for 8 months and had not paid social security for 10 years. He posted this on a social platform, but the bus company complained and deleted it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hackers from China hacked into the U.S. Treasury Department's office responsible for economic sanctions.
U.S. Treasury Department: In early December, hackers hacked into BeyondTrust, a third-party cybersecurity service provider, and were able to read some non-confidential documents of the Treasury Department remotely. The U.S. Treasury Department also said there were signs that the hackers were supported by the Chinese state.
A spokesperson for the Chinese Embassy in the United States criticized that the accusation was part of a smear attack and had no factual basis.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 1, a propaganda poster outside Guangdong Heyuan Friendship Hospital stated: "Abortion damages the vitality of the man's family" "Children born to mothers who have never had an abortion are mostly well-behaved, filial, and smart" "Abortion cuts off the bloodline of ancestors and is the greatest disobedience and unfilial piety" 
Hospital response: It was not done by our hospital and has been removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 1, Shanghai. The Internet user "Love in Late Autumn Uncle" predicted that the stock market would rise sharply, but the market closed at 3351.76 points on January 31, down 1.63%. Investors came to Guangdong Road to "attack" the uncle, but the uncle did not show up that day. Some investors even put photos of the uncle with the words "shameless" on display on Guangdong Road.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ukraine stops Russian natural gas transit, and Moscow loses the European market that it built over half a century.
From January 1 this year, the Ukrainian energy pipeline used by Russia to export natural gas to Europe was officially closed, marking the end of Russia's decades-long dominance in the European energy market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 31, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Netizens said that around 3pm, there were many people waiting in the lobby of Xinjie Police Station for traffic violations, but the staff were chatting and resting in the backstage, and ignored the people who had been waiting outside for a long time.
The poster also said that after the video was released, he received a call from the relevant department and was asked to delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Financial Times reports that Russia leaked military documents: Russia will attack Japan and South Korea if war with NATO breaks out.
A set of leaked Russian military secret documents from 2013 to 2014 outlined the attack plan, which included attacks on 160 locations such as roads, bridges and factories. Russian military planners are concerned that if a war breaks out with NATO, the country's eastern border will be exposed and vulnerable to attacks by the United States' regional allies.
In February this year, the Financial Times reported that the leaked documents also contained previously unknown details of the principles for the use of nuclear weapons, and that Russia's Eastern Theater had conducted response drills for a variety of scenarios in which China might invade.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 2, the unveiling ceremony of the Research Center for a Community with a Shared Future for Mankind was held in Beijing. Foreign Minister Wang Yi delivered a speech at the unveiling ceremony of the research center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content:
January 2, Guangdong. A Huawei Wenjie M9 owner said that she was outside the car, but the car "ran on its own" and hit someone else's car, and the door could not be opened at the time of the incident.
The owner also said that the 4S shop took away the dashcam and memory card immediately after the incident. She also said that she is a loyal fan of Huawei, and her car, mobile phone, and watch are all Huawei.
At present, the relevant video posted by the owner has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/BZT7VpxCPB

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, there was a rumor online that "a large number of foreign-funded enterprises have withdrawn from Suzhou". The official rumor was refuted: In October 2024, foreign investment in Suzhou increased by 1.9% year-on-year. Some netizens on Zhihu pointed out that from January to November 2024, the number of foreign-funded enterprises in Suzhou increased by about 1,000; however, from January to October 2024, the actual use of foreign capital in Suzhou was US$5.122 billion, a year-on-year decrease of 24.8%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A leaflet on delayed retirement was posted by netizens, which introduced the reasons for delayed retirement and policy regulations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 30, Shanghai. A Russian walked into a Russian goods store and said that some of the goods sold in the store had never been seen in Russia. Some of the goods were indeed from Russia, but the prices were several times higher than those in Russia.
It is reported that the regulatory authorities have conducted inspections on this, and some Russian goods stores have begun to close due to the impact of business locations and qualifications. The current craze for opening stores is more like a short-term carnival to make quick money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 25, a netizen posted a video introducing the deeds of Yu Donglai, chairman of Pangdonglai, who cared about his employees.
The video was flooded with comments such as "Are kings, princes, generals, and ministers of different species?"
Currently, all comments in the video have been cleared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 2 (Released) Hainan. A doctor reported in real name that Ma Mouduo, the Party Secretary of Lingshui Li Autonomous County Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital, and Liu Mouhua, the Director.
The doctor said that the two had won over Xiao Feng, the former Deputy Secretary of the County Party Committee and Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission, and set up a health care office for him to serve his related personnel; they did not deliver on the promised talent introduction benefits and threatened not to file complaints and petitions; and some doctors were dismissed for not receiving leaders well.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Caixin: Some Chinese flights have begun to bypass Russia's southern airspace.
Some Chinese airlines have begun to bypass Russia's southern airspace, which is exactly the area where the Azerbaijan Airlines flight was suspected to have been shot down by Russian air defense forces.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On New Year's Eve, Ukraine and Russia exchanged more than 300 prisoners.
A Russian soldier with severe myopia was released in the prisoner exchange. The soldier said that when he was captured, he couldn't even see the enemy clearly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Taiwan's latest poll: More than half of Taiwanese people want independence, nearly 80% dislike the CCP
The latest poll by the Taiwan Public Opinion Foundation on the "unification or independence" tendency of Taiwanese people shows that more than half of Taiwanese people want Taiwan to be independent, about a quarter want to maintain the status quo, and only more than 10% of Taiwanese people want to unify with China.
Another poll on the support of Taiwanese people for political parties shows that nearly 80% of Taiwanese people dislike the ruling Communist Party of China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens discovered that the tone of the comment section of the official Weibo account of the U.S. Embassy in China has changed, with many comments promoting "Sino-U.S. friendship" appearing in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Hubei, an old lady asked the diners in the restaurant if they could give her some leftovers. The old lady said that she couldn't find a job because she was too old, so she worked as a cleaner in the Impression City shopping mall. She mopped the garbage all day and her hands and feet were sore. As a result, she was fired by her boss for not cleaning up. She didn't receive her salary and didn't even have money to buy tickets to go home for the New Year.
The kind-hearted man exchanged some cash for the old lady, but found that the old lady had disappeared after the exchange.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Linyi, Shandong, a 90-year-old grandfather made a living by picking up trash. The old man said that his wife had passed away 30 years ago and his only son also passed away 10 years ago. He could sell bottles for about 3 yuan every day. He was reluctant to eat meat and only ate a little bit during the Chinese New Year. A kind man bought some meat and fruit for the old grandfather.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A military service registration notice issued by Guangdong Province was circulated online, requiring all males born in 2007 to register for military service before May 2025.
Those who evade military service registration will be punished according to law, and will be forced to perform military service obligations. If the behavior is serious and constitutes a crime, criminal liability will be pursued according to law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2, Japan held the "Hakone Ekiden" foot race. During this period, Chinese Internet celebrity "Shen Cuttlefish" entered the track to follow the contestants.
 The rules of the event clearly state that spectators are not allowed to walk on the track. Shen Wuzui's behavior was dissatisfied by netizens. Afterwards, he issued an apology on social platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 17 (Release), Anhui Huaibei writer Li Xin, who spent 13 years writing a historical and cultural novel with Rosen, was detained by the police on suspicion of producing and selling obscene materials for profit, and was sentenced to 10 years in prison at the first instance by the court. On October 24, it was reported that a father-in-law used his 44-year-old mentally retarded daughter-in-law to pay off debts and assisted others in rape for 18 months, and was sentenced to 5 years in prison. On November 22, it was reported that a stepfather was sentenced to three years and two months for sexually assaulting his 16-year-old stepdaughter.
